column1: Local Foods////- "Crunchy" Chicken: This name is a little misleading
column2: because the nut crumble and crushed chips give the sandwich a texture that
column4: isn't actually crunchy. It's a great sandwich though and is what I recommend to friends on their first visit. This is literally the only sandwich my husband has gotten in all the years we've been coming here
column5: and he happily refuses to order anything else.
